faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I choose the right plan?
faq.a1: Choose based on your team size, project complexity, and required features. Free is good for individuals, Professional for small teams, and Enterprise for comprehensive features and support.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Space-Brain was founded in 2020 with a mission to create intelligent development tools that enhance productivity.
story.paragraph2: Our team of experienced developers and designers is dedicated to building tools that make coding more efficient and enjoyable.
story.paragraph3: We believe in the power of technology to transform the way developers work and create.
